mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_AGRG T1 /*웰스파트너서비스실적집계*/ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_NTORP_PERF_MM_CL T2 /*순주문파트너실적월마감*/ ON T1.BASE_YM = T2.BASE_YM AND T1.BASE_YM = T2.PERF_YM AND T1.CL_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND T1.CL_DV_CD = '02' /*마감구분코드 02-순주문2차*/ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} AND T1.PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD = 'SV01999909' AND T2.PERF_DV_CD = '0' AND T2.PERF_ATC_CD = 'W02P00095' /*실적항목코드-W02P00095 수정비율*/
